displayName.text: PCR TEST FOR TRAVEL - Results in 1-5 hours - WE COME TO YOU

authorAttributions.displayName: PCR TEST FOR TRAVEL - Results in 1-5 hours - WE COME TO YOU

adrFormatAddress: 312 Bowery, New York, NY 10012-1148, USA

originalText.text: We were in need of an emergency RT-PCR test and this service did not disappoint. They are very responsive. I got answers to all my questions. The process was easy to follow, payment method was seamless and we were able to get the results back on time, right before our scheduled flight. Five stars for David and the nurse Madea. These guys were amazing. Can’t recommend it enough.

text.text: We were in need of an emergency RT-PCR test and this service did not disappoint. They are very responsive. I got answers to all my questions. The process was easy to follow, payment method was seamless and we were able to get the results back on time, right before our scheduled flight. Five stars for David and the nurse Madea. These guys were amazing. Can’t recommend it enough.

originalText.text: Stranded in NY with a few minutes to go before airport check in and this team saved my life. After my call, took twenty minutes to have a nurse in my hotel taking the test and results received about an hour later. They went out of their way to ensure I didn’t miss my flight. Will definitely be using them every time I am in NY.

text.text: Stranded in NY with a few minutes to go before airport check in and this team saved my life. After my call, took twenty minutes to have a nurse in my hotel taking the test and results received about an hour later. They went out of their way to ensure I didn’t miss my flight. Will definitely be using them every time I am in NY.

originalText.text: Dave and his staff were wonderful from start to finish. My flight to South Africa got cancelled and rebooked for a different flight 24 hours later, which caused my original covid test to be invalid (outside the required testing window). Dave got someone to the airport to get me tested right at the check in area and got my test results in less than two hours! Couldn’t have been more satisfied. Thanks Dave!!

text.text: Dave and his staff were wonderful from start to finish. My flight to South Africa got cancelled and rebooked for a different flight 24 hours later, which caused my original covid test to be invalid (outside the required testing window). Dave got someone to the airport to get me tested right at the check in area and got my test results in less than two hours! Couldn’t have been more satisfied. Thanks Dave!!

originalText.text:
Used this service on 12/26/21.
Filled out a request in their online portal and received a text minutes later to confirm.
(Btw just texting the contact number is even faster)
A nurse was at my apartment less than 1 hour later (gently) administering the RT-PCR tests for me and my husband.
4 hours later we received our negative results and were able to upload them for our travels seamlessly, without leaving our couch!
Thank you!

originalText.text: This service was really great.  I texted their number before my trip to the UK. They had someone at my hotel within 3 hours and I had the results 3 hours after that.  Wonderful experience
